title: Pre - Lease This 3 Bed 2 Bath For September And Get $500 Off!
posting_body: Welcome to a mountain view community that’s quiet, comfortable and near everything that matters.
Elevate, Centennial’s newest place to call home, brings you high-end apartment living close to the Denver Tech Center.
Your plush apartment offers large windows, a gourmet kitchen, high ceilings, walk-in closets and a private patio.
When it’s time for a little company, head to the sundeck for a swim, workout in the fitness center, catch a game in the lounge, grill on the patio and people watch.
Unwind, meet-up and be yourself in a community that takes easy living to a new level.
Contact us today to hand-select your new Centennial apartment.
Use this link for more details:
This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1238 Sq.
- Gourmet kitchens with subway tile backsplashes
- Private patios, some with mountain views
- Second-story lounge with big screen TVs and TopBrewer espresso machine
- Near Denver Tech Center with easy access to commuter corridors
- Yoga and spinning studio with Peloton Bikes
- Gaming room with big screen TV's, fireplace and billiards.
- Outdoor courtyards with fire pits and BBQ grills
Residents are welcome to have spayed or neutered cats and dogs — up to two pets maximum.
Pet owners will be charged an additional deposit of $200, a one-time fee of $200 and a rental surcharge of $30 per month.
Please contact us for a list of our restricted breeds.
On the corner of Havana St and Geddes St.
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
